citation.title: Topic indexing of TV broadcast news programs.

citation.title: Statistical models for text segmentation.
citation.rawString: BEEFERMAN D., BERGER A. & LAFFERTY J. (1999). Statistical models for text segmentation. Machine Learning, 34(1-3), 177–210.

citation.title: Maximum entropy segmentation of broadcast news.
citation.rawString: CHRISTENSEN H., KOLLURU B. & ET al. Y. G. (2005). Maximum entropy segmentation of broadcast news. In 30th IEEE ICASSP.

citation.rawString: HEARST M. A. (1997). Texttiling : segmenting text into multi-paragraph subtopic passages. Computational Linguistics, 23, 33–64.
